Package directory

Class DirectoryBase

java.lang.Object
directory.DirectoryBase
All Implemented Interfaces:
DirectoryBaseInterface
public class DirectoryBase
extends java.lang.Object
implements DirectoryBaseInterface
DirectoryBase holds the team and user directories, holding specialised methods for manipulating directory data

  • Constructor Summary

      userDirectory - instance of UserDirectory
      teamDirectory - instance of TeamDirectory

      public boolean addUserToTeam​(Team team, Employee user)
      Add a user to a team (if non-existent, add team to user's associated teams, and add user to team's members)
      Specified by:
      addUserToTeam in interface DirectoryBaseInterface
      Parameters:
      team - team subject to having a new member
      user - user subject to having a new associated team
      Returns:
      true/false value for successful/unsuccessful operation (false: parameter user or team not found)

    • removeUserFromTeam

      public boolean removeUserFromTeam​(Team team, Employee user)
      Remove a user from a team (if existent remove team from user's associated teams, remove user from team's members)
      Specified by:
      removeUserFromTeam in interface DirectoryBaseInterface
      Parameters:
      team - team subject to having a member removed
      user - user subject to having a associated team removed
      Returns:
      true/false value for successful/unsuccessful operation (false: parameter user or team found)
